sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: What is the surface area of a cube with a side length of 5cm?
message_2:
The surface area of a cube can be calculated using the formula:

Surface Area = 6 × (side length)²

Given the side length of the cube is 5 cm, we can plug this value into the formula:

Surface Area = 6 × (5 cm)²

Surface Area = 6 × 25 cm²

Surface Area = 150 cm²

The surface area of the cube is 150 square centimeters.
